title: No fences, no boundaries: Walter Burley Griffin
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission, Australia Council and Tristram Miall
brief_description: Looks at the architect, Walter Burley Griffin’s work in Australia, with particular emphasis on his plans for the building of Canberra, Australia’s capital city. Cast: Caroline Tessandier as Marion Griffin.
